title: DIA Offers Rare Opportunity to Core77 Readers
description: Advantage: Core77 Reader! Tomorrow, June 20th, the DIA Awards - an international awards program with an international jury - free entry period comes to an end. But guess what? Here at Core77 we've been given a special opportunity for all our readers.Register with this code US2025-PMPC1KK and not only is your entry free, you also have until September 20th to finish it. And just like those infomercials in the 80's - but wait there's more! So a free entry AND your entry is fast-tracked to round two because you used the Core77 code.You've got nothing to lose, so enter now!

html:
DIA Offers Rare Opportunity to Core77 Readers

Your entry remains free until September 20th

Advantage: Core77 Reader! Tomorrow, June 20th, the DIA Awards - an international awards program with an international jury - free entry period comes to an end. But guess what? Here at Core77 we've been given a special opportunity for all our readers.

Register with this code US2025-PMPC1KK and not only is your entry free, you also have until September 20th to finish it. And just like those infomercials in the 80's - but wait there's more! So a free entry AND your entry is fast-tracked to round two because you used the Core77 code.

You've got nothing to lose, so enter now!
